attributes.action: recognise the IMMORALITY of the income divide in Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Million pound bonuses in one year, when most of us will not earn a million pounds in our entire working lives, are absolutely immoral.
Several-million-pounds salary a year earned by 'captains of industry' are, by the same factor of 50, 100 or more, also abhorrent.
That a small privileged group of people should have such incomes, when 95% of the population sweat and worry their way through life's finances, is a facet of Britain we cannot be proud of.
